block.field:
This automation adds shot numbers to the top 
left or right of a 16:9 video frame.
The automation references clips on track V1.

Input options should be set prior to running the
automation.

"Track for Numbers" must be 2 or higher!
The clips we want to number are on V1, hence, the numbers must be inserted on track V2 or higher.

mutation.fullPath: click refresh icon to choose selected project item

shadow.field: click refresh icon to choose selected project item

var newTrackItem = seq.importMGT(mogrtFile.fsName, time.ticks, videoTrack-1, audioTrack-1);
if (!newTrackItem) throw new Error("track item could not be created");
if (!(newTrackItem.projectItem)) throw new Error("track item of mogrt has no project item");
newTrackItem.projectItem
